chunk:
Versed Skin Soak Rich Moisture Cream

Brand: Versed

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Squalane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan

Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Squalane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Palmaria Palmata Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate

Directions: How: Warm a peanut-size amount between fingertips and smooth into skin. 
Where: Entire face.
When: PM and/or AM after applying serum and eye care.

Warnings: : For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

Warnings: : For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
